recipesJson.name: The Pinnacle: Deep Fried Strawberry Ice Cream
recipesJson.author: BubbasBrewz
recipesJson.description:
Dr.Fog Strawberry Deep Fried Ice Cream ****CLONE****

Two week steep is required. 

Chefs MFIC is the star here at 12%. You can really use it as a base and throw any fruits on top of that. But this is my preferred mix-up. 

After steeping with the strawberry it really pops. Quick and easy recipe with huge reward.

pageContext.name: The Pinnacle: Deep Fried Strawberry Ice Cream
